'''Magishroom''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Floating Dendro Fungus''' that appears in the [[Fungus Mechanicus]] event.

{{Enemy Stats
|hide_notes = 1

|dendro_res  = 25%

|hp_ratio  = 1.8

|atk_ratio = 4.32
|atk_type  = 2
}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Floating Dendro Fungus

|name_1      = Skill: Flowery Flechettes
|desc_1      = Fires 5 enhanced Wildgrass Bullets consecutively, each dealing '''300% ATK''' as {{Color|Dendro DMG}}.
|file_1      = Floating Dendro Fungus Flowery Flechettes 2

|name_2      = Spore Bullet
|desc_2      = Fires a Wildgrass Bullet, dealing '''240% ATK''' as {{Color|Dendro DMG}}.

|name_3      = Flourishing Vitality
|desc_3      = For every 3 Wildgrass Bullets fired, heals the Lil' Fungus with the lowest [[HP]] in the party by '''30%''' of their Max HP. 
}}
